title: GRID.Autosport.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
GRID.Autosport.Repack-R.G.Mechanics




Release Info:

Year: 2014
Genre: Racing
Developer: Codemasters Racing
Publisher: Codemasters
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: RELOADED


System Requirements:

Operating System: XP / Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4Ghz or AMD Athlon X2 5400+
Memory: 2 GB
Video: Intel HD3000 or AMD HD2000 Series or NVIDIA Geforce 8000 Series Series
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 12.6 GB

Game information:

Continuation of the popular series of virtual racing GRID
created with the wishes of the vast community of fans,
work on the game was conducted in close collaboration
with professional athletes and experts racing magazine Autosport.
Feel like a real professional, participating in classical and
modern forms of racing! In GRID Autosport, competing for the
laurels of the winner, you will not only try to get around
opponents, but also to satisfy the ambitions of its sponsors.
It is important to every change in your ranking position,
and any race can be decisive.
In career mode GRID Autosport you can specialize in a particular
discipline or try yourself in all - and each is a great experience!
Feel strong voltage circuit racing, take part in the long night
endurance races, which will be a serious test of the quality of
the tires of your iron horse, demonstrate the skill of driving
open-wheel and show what you can, in extreme street races or
contests on the tuned cars .

Game Features:

Different types of events and disciplines, including
circuit races, endurance races, drifting, race single-seater,
modified cars, supercars and prototypes.
22 locations and more than hundreds of different trails.
A huge car park and ample opportunities for modification
of any machine.
Multiplayer competition in the RaceNet, uniting millions
of players, weekly specials and team "clan" of the race.

Repack Features:

GRID Autosport
Version of the game - v1.0.100.5260
Do not cut / recoded

Additions:

High Res Texture Pack
Black Edition Content
Season Pass
Boost Pack
Premium Garage Pack
Best of British Pack
